This is a collection of blogs about statistics and statistical learning, usually centered around biological applications.  I like writing and spreading knowledge, but I don't like the peer review process. hence the blog. 


<sub><sup> Disclaimer: These essays represent my personal views and are not reflective of the views of my current or past employers. </sup></sub>
